value.title: Day of Year and Day of Quarter   DAX calculations for Power BI

These calculations, however, are very simple and easy to implement using other functions. This short blog and video explain a method to calculate those

value.title: Extract Parts of a Text Value in Power BI using a Delimiter Power Query Transformation
value.excerpt: If you have a text field and you want to extract a part of that text field, there are multiple ways to do that. You can do this using the SUBSTRING function in DAX. However, These types of actions are better to be done using Power Query transformations. Fortunately, Power Query is very easy and simple

value.title: Fibonacci Sequence   Understanding the Power Query Recursive Function for Power BI
value.excerpt: Recursive functions in Power Query are not very popular, but sometimes very helpful when in need. In this post, I'll explain what a recursive function is, how it works, and explain it through a famous recursive example of Fibonacci Sequence. value.title: How to modify a linked entity in Power BI dataflows
